verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Behold the LORD רֹכֵ֨ב <WH7392> rideth עַל־ <WH5921> and עָ֥ב <WH5645> cloud קַל֙ <WH7031> upon a swift וּבָ֣א <WH935> and shall come מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וְנָע֞וּ <WH5128> shall be moved אֱלִילֵ֤י <WH457> and the idols מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt מִפָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> at his presence וּלְבַ֥ב <WH3824> and the heart מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt יִמַּ֥ס <WH4549> shall melt בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> in the midst

וְסִכְסַכְתִּ֤י <WH5526> And I will set מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> the Egyptians בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> against the Egyptians וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <WH3898> and they shall fight אִישׁ־ <WH376> every one בְּאָחִ֖יו <WH251> against his brother וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and every one בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> against his neighbour עִ֣יר <WH5892> city בְּעִ֔יר <WH5892> against city מַמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> [and] kingdom בְּמַמְלָכָֽה׃ <WH4467> against kingdom

וְנָבְקָ֤ה <WH1238> shall fail רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> And the spirit מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <WH7130> in the midst וַעֲצָת֖וֹ <WH6098> the counsel אֲבַלֵּ֑עַ <WH1104> thereof and I will destroy וְדָרְשׁ֤וּ <WH1875> thereof and they shall seek אֶל־ <WH413> to הָֽאֱלִילִים֙ <WH457> to the idols וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הָ֣אִטִּ֔ים <WH328> and to the charmers וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הָאֹב֖וֹת <WH178> and to them that have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַיִּדְּעֹנִֽים׃ <WH3049> and to the wizards

וְסִכַּרְתִּי֙ <WH5534> will I give over אֶת־ <WH853> And מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> into the hand אֲדֹנִ֣ים <WH113> lord קָשֶׁ֑ה <WH7186> of a cruel וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king עַז֙ <WH5794> and a fierce יִמְשָׁל־ <WH4910> shall rule בָּ֔ם נְאֻ֥ם <WH5002> over them saith הָאָד֖וֹן <WH113> the Lord יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts
וְנִשְּׁתוּ־ <WH3001> and dried up מַ֖יִם <WH4325> And the waters מֵֽהַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> from the sea וְנָהָ֖ר <WH5104> and the river יֶחֱרַ֥ב <WH2717> shall be wasted וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <WH5405> shall fail

וְהֶאֶזְנִ֣יחוּ <WH2186> far away נְהָר֔וֹת <WH5104> the rivers דָּלֲל֥וּ <WH1809> shall be emptied וְחָרְב֖וּ <WH2717> and dried up יְאֹרֵ֣י <WH2975> [and] the brooks מָצ֑וֹר <WH4693> of defence קָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> the reeds וָס֖וּף <WH5488> and flags קָמֵֽלוּ׃ <WH7060> shall wither

עָר֥וֹת <WH6169> The paper reeds עַל־ <WH5921> by יְא֖וֹר <WH2975> by the brooks עַל־ <WH5921> by פִּ֣י <WH6310> by the mouth יְא֑וֹר <WH2975> of the brooks וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all מִזְרַ֣ע <WH4218> and every thing sown יְא֔וֹר <WH2975> by the brooks יִיבַ֥שׁ <WH3001> shall wither נִדַּ֖ף <WH5086> be driven away וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> and be no

וְאָנוּ֙ <WH578> also shall mourn הַדַּיָּגִ֔ים <WH1771> The fishers וְאָ֣בְל֔וּ <WH56> shall lament כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מַשְׁלִיכֵ֥י <WH7993> and all they that cast בַיְא֖וֹר <WH2975> into the brooks חַכָּ֑ה <WH2443> angle וּפֹרְשֵׂ֥י <WH6566> and they that spread מִכְמֹ֛רֶת <WH4365> nets עַל־ <WH5921> up פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> upon מַ֖יִם <WH4325> the waters אֻמְלָֽלוּ׃ <WH535> shall languish

וּבֹ֛שׁוּ <WH954> shall be confounded עֹבְדֵ֥י <WH5647> Moreover they that work פִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6593> flax שְׂרִיק֑וֹת <WH8305> in fine וְאֹרְגִ֖ים <WH707> and they that weave חוֹרָֽי׃ <WH2355> networks

וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become שָׁתֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH8356> in the purposes מְדֻכָּאִ֑ים <WH1792> And they shall be broken כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֹ֥שֵׂי <WH6213> thereof all that make שֶׂ֖כֶר <WH7938> sluices אַגְמֵי־ <WH99> [and] ponds נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> for fish

אַךְ־ <WH389> are mere אֱוִלִים֙ <WH196> foolish שָׂ֣רֵי <WH8269> Surely the princes צֹ֔עַן <WH6814> of Zoan חַכְמֵי֙ <WH2450> of the wise יֹעֲצֵ֣י <WH6098> the counsel פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh עֵצָ֖ה <WH6098> the advice נִבְעָרָ֑ה <WH1197> is become brutish אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How תֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> how say אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> ye unto Pharaoh בֶּן־ <WH1121> I [am] the son חֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> of the wise אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> king קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of ancient

אַיָּם֙ <WH335> Where אֵפ֣וֹא <WH645> [are] they? where חֲכָמֶ֔יךָ <WH2450> [are] thy wise וְיַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> [men]? and let them tell נָ֖א <WH4994> I beseech thee לָ֑ךְ וְיֵ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> thee now and let them know מַה־ <WH4100> what יָּעַ֛ץ <WH3289> hath purposed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עַל־ <WH5921> against מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> upon Egypt

נֽוֹאֲלוּ֙ <WH2973> are become fools שָׂ֣רֵי <WH8269> The princes צֹ֔עַן <WH6814> of Zoan נִשְּׁא֖וּ <WH5377> are deceived שָׂ֣רֵי <WH8269> the princes נֹ֑ף <WH5297> of Noph הִתְע֥וּ <WH8582> they have also seduced אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> Egypt פִּנַּ֥ת <WH6438> [even they that are] the stay שְׁבָטֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7626> of the tribes

יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD מָסַ֥ךְ <WH4537> hath mingled בְּקִרְבָּ֖הּ <WH7130> in the midst ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> spirit עִוְעִ֑ים <WH5773> a perverse וְהִתְע֤וּ <WH8582> to err אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> thereof and they have caused Egypt בְּכָֽל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <WH4639> in every work כְּהִתָּע֥וֹת <WH8582> [man] staggereth שִׁכּ֖וֹר <WH7910> thereof as a drunken בְּקִיאֽוֹ׃ <WH6892> in his vomit

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> for Egypt מַֽעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH4639> Neither shall there be [any] work אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> Which יַעֲשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> may do רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> which the head וְזָנָ֖ב <WH2180> or tail כִּפָּ֥ה <WH3712> branch וְאַגְמֽוֹן׃ <WH100> or rush ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will become מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> shall Egypt כַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> be like unto women וְחָרַ֣ד ׀ <WH2729> and it shall be afraid וּפָחַ֗ד <WH6342> and fear מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> because תְּנוּפַת֙ <WH8573> of the shaking יַד־ <WH3027> of the hand יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ה֖וּא <WH1931> he מֵנִ֥יף <WH5130> which he shaketh עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> over

וְ֠הָיְתָה <WH1961> will become אַדְמַ֨ת <WH127> And the land יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah לְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> unto Egypt לְחָגָּ֔א <WH2283> shall be a terror כֹּל֩ <WH3605> everyone אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom יַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> every one that maketh mention אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> will be in יִפְחָ֑ד <WH6342> thereof shall be afraid מִפְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> in himself because עֲצַת֙ <WH6098> of the counsel יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ה֖וּא <WH1931> He יוֹעֵ֥ץ <WH3289> which he hath determined עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> against ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֡וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיוּ֩ <WH1961> become חָמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> shall five עָרִ֜ים <WH5892> cities בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מְדַבְּרוֹת֙ <WH1696> speak שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> the language כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וְנִשְׁבָּע֖וֹת <WH7650> and swear לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עִ֣יר <WH5892> The city הַהֶ֔רֶס <WH2041> of destruction יֵאָמֵ֖ר <WH559> shall be called לְאֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> one ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> shall there be an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> to the LORD בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּמַצֵּבָ֥ה <WH4676> and a pillar אֵֽצֶל־ <WH681> at גְּבוּלָ֖הּ <WH1366> the border לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> thereof to the LORD

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> will become לְא֥וֹת <WH226> And it shall be for a sign וּלְעֵ֛ד <WH5707> and for a witness לַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִצְעֲק֤וּ <WH6817> for they shall cry אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because לֹֽחֲצִ֔ים <WH3905> of the oppressors וְיִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> and he shall send לָהֶ֛ם מוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> them a saviour וָרָ֖ב <WH7227> and a great one וְהִצִּילָֽם׃ <WH5337> and he shall deliver

וְנוֹדַ֤ע <WH3045> shall be known יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> to Egypt וְיָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> shall know מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> and the Egyptians אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְעָֽבְדוּ֙ <WH5647> and shall do זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> and oblation וְנָדְרוּ־ <WH5087> yea they shall vow נֵ֥דֶר <WH5088> a vow לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְשִׁלֵּֽמוּ׃ <WH7999> and perform

וְנָגַ֧ף <WH5062> shall smite יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> Egypt נָגֹ֣ף <WH5062> he shall smite וְרָפ֑וֹא <WH7495> and heal וְשָׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> [it] and they shall return עַד־ <WH5704> against יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [even] to the LORD וְנֶעְתַּ֥ר <WH6279> and he shall be intreated לָהֶ֖ם וּרְפָאָֽם׃ <WH7495> of them and shall heal

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he תִּהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> will be a מְסִלָּ֤ה <WH4546> shall there be a highway מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> out of Egypt אַשּׁ֔וּרָה <WH804> to Assyria וּבָֽא־ <WH935> shall come אַשּׁ֥וּר <WH804> and the Assyrian בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> and the Egyptian בְּאַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> into Assyria וְעָבְד֥וּ <WH5647> shall serve מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> and the Egyptians אֶת־ <WH853> אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> with the Assyrians ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> shall Israel שְׁלִ֣ישִׁיָּ֔ה <WH7992> be the third לְמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> with Egypt וּלְאַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> and with Assyria בְּרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> [even] a blessing בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> whom בֵּרֲכ֛וֹ <WH1288> shall bless יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Whom the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בָּר֨וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed עַמִּ֜י <WH5971> my people מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> [be] Egypt וּמַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> the work יָדַי֙ <WH3027> of my hands אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> and Assyria וְנַחֲלָתִ֖י <WH5159> mine inheritance יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and Israel ס
